name: dev.ucp.shopping.checkout
title: Checkout Response
description: Base checkout schema. Extensions compose onto this using allOf.

id.description: Unique identifier of the checkout session.

line_items.description: List of line items being checked out.

status.description: Checkout state indicating the current phase and required action. See Checkout Status lifecycle documentation for state transition details.

messages.description: List of messages with error and info about the checkout session state.

links.description: Links to be displayed by the platform (Privacy Policy, TOS). Mandatory for legal compliance.

expires_at.description: RFC 3339 expiry timestamp. Default TTL is 6 hours from creation if not sent.

continue_url.description: URL for checkout handoff and session recovery. MUST be provided when status is requires_escalation. See specification for format and availability requirements.

order.description: Details about an order created for this checkout session.
